original_text: And Jotham slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David his father: and Ahaz his son reigned in his stead.
korean_text: 요담이 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 그의 조상 다윗 성에 조상들과 함께 장사되고 그 아들 아하스가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Jotham slept with his fathers
and was buried with his fathers in the city of David his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗의 성읍에서 그의 조상들과 함께 장사되었으며

sentences.original_text: and Ahaz his son reigned in his stead
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 아하스가 그를 대신하여 왕이 되었다
